articles.title: Nicola Coughlan & Luke Newton Step Out for 'Bridgerton' Season 3 Part 2 Premiere in Toronto - Just Jared
articles.content:
Nicola Coughlan and Luke Newton are together again on the red carpet!
The co-stars posed for photos as they arrived at the Bridgerton Season 3 Part 2 premiere on Monday evening (June 3) held at the … [+548 chars]

articles.author: Kristin Baver
articles.title: Costumes of Star Wars: The Acolyte - Star Wars
articles.description: Costume designer Jennifer Bryan shares a closer look at Mae, Sol, Indara, and other characters from the new Star Wars series.
articles.content:
Mae
Mae (Amandla Stenberg), the assassin at the heart of the series, is a warrior constantly on the move. Bryan and her team took great care to reflect that in Maes costume, which mixes chainmail, b… [+2172 chars]
